description: ivory pendant with golden-brown patina; carved in an arcing horn shape; narrow end carved with round and triangular elements and open ring; silver collar at wide end with small silver band near narrow end; silver band decorated with incised arcs and circles; wide end decorated with pair of raised bands; end has raised rectangular element with studs at corners
dimension:
1 3/4 x 8 5/8 x 1 5/16 in. (4.45 x 21.91 x 3.33 cm) (without chain)
20 in. (50.8 cm) (object part, chain length)
inscription:
Inscription

on bottom of silver cap at widest end, in black on white: [86-89-1]
title: Pendant with chain
